items.title: What is AI Coloring Page Generator?
items.description: Our tool transforms photos and text prompts into printable coloring pages using AI.

items.title: What file formats can I upload?
items.description: Upload JPEG or PNG images up to 5MB to create coloring pages.

items.title: Is it free to use?
items.description: Basic features are free. Premium plans unlock higher resolution and batch processing.
